title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Fenix A320 - Control the EFB and MCDU via another device
description:
In this video we will have a look at new functionality added to the Fenix A320. Using the block 2 update you will now be able to control both the EFB and the MCDU from a browser. This makes it possible to control the EFB and/or MCDU via a different device which makes flying this aircraft even more exiting. 

00:00 intro
00:10 requirements
00:36 EFB and MCDU in a browser
02:27 GSX integration options in the EFB
08:00 using the integration
